title: The Best of 2021
description:
It was a year of highs and lows but one thing is for sure... We'd pick up our dogs shit on Tommy Harper's lawn. Enjoy the very best of The Kirk Minihane Show for 2021. Happy Holidays to each and every Minifan and thank you for supporting the show all year long! Thanks to Harrison for his hard work putting this together!


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
